title.oldValue: Microsoft Teams: Privacy and CSV import enhancements in Shifts app
title.newValue: Microsoft Teams: Excel import enhancements in Shifts app

description.oldValue: In the Shifts app, frontline managers will be able to specify how far in the past their employees can access schedule data. They will also be able to determine whether employees can view each other's breaks and notes. Finally, managers can import and export scheduling reports, including time-off schedules, open shifts, and assigned shifts.
description.newValue: Frontline managers will gain the ability to import an Excel file into Shifts with time off and open shift entities. Complementary, those entities will also be supported when managers export schedules in a compatible format to import.
